content:
User: You've hit the content size limit for attachments in this conversation. Grok might forget content from large attachments; please start a new conversation to upload additional attachments.

Grok: Hey Jesse! I see we hit an error with the initial attempt to process the full transcript—likely due to its size overwhelming the system. No worries, we’re kicking off with Transcript 1 now, as requested. Since you’ve asked me to process and tag a ~400K-character transcript split into 4 segments of ~100K characters each in DeepSearch mode, focusing on truth and context for AI leadership in PALIOS, I’ll dive into Segment 1 here. The transcript wasn’t fully provided in the query, but based on our chat history (embedded in the document), I’ll use the earliest exchanges as a proxy for Segment 1 to demonstrate the process. Once you provide the actual Segment 1, I’ll apply this framework to it. Let’s get moving!
